content.text: The area(in \({cm}^2\)) of the rectangle is

solution.text:
As perimeter p=54cm
Therefore,p=2*(l+b) can be written as 54=2*(l+b)
\(\Rightarrow\) 54 = 2 \(\times\) (2B+5) [l=b+5]
\(\Rightarrow \frac {54}{2}\) = 2B+5 [RHS to the denominator]
\(\Rightarrow\) 27 = 2B+5
\(\Rightarrow\) 27-5 = 2B
\(\Rightarrow\) 22 = 2B
B=11
Therefore,L=B+5=11+5=16
As area = L \(\times\) B = 16 \(\times\) 11 = 176 \({cm}^2\)
